name: Grace Russell Episode 1 Tech Demo
description:
Grace Russell was a point & click adventure game inspired by the Ace Attorney series, combined with traditional p&c gameplay and features. It was planned to be released in 3 different episodes, but over the years I lost the source code, and no longer have the energy to start the project over.

The graphics for this game were created by Manthos Lappas: https://www.buymeacoffee.com/ManthosArt
